meanings.definition: Engaging in piracy or plundering at sea.
meanings.sent1: The pirates were buccaneering on the high seas.
meanings.sent2: The buccaneering ship attacked the merchant vessel.
meanings.sent3: The buccaneering crew found a treasure map and set sail.
meanings.sent4: The buccaneering captain's flag struck fear into sailors' hearts.
meanings.sent5: The buccaneering raid was swift and ruthless.

meanings.sent5: The buccaneering attitude was admired by some and feared by others.
